quotes: McPeak entered the U.S. Air Force in November 1957 and was a fighter pilot during his early years.

From 1988 to 1991, Moiseyev served as Army General Chief of the Soviet General Staff, during which time he oversaw the dissolution of the Warsaw Treaty Organization and intense arms control negotiations, including the Conventional Forces in Europe Treaty.
Nambiar was elected to the Council of the United Service Institution of India in 1995 and became the director of the institution in 1996.
Nambiar was elected to the Council of the United Service Institution of India in 1995 and became the director of the institution in 1996.
He passed away in December 2022.
